<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1046400_auction_my_bid</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Bidamount</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    var grItem = new GlideRecord("x_1046400_auction_all_item");
    grItem.query();
	var mybid=new GlideRecord("x_1046400_auction_my_bid");
	
    while (grItem.next()) {
        mybid.setValue("u_reference_1", grItem.getValue("u_currency_1")); // update your custom field name and replace custom_field_name
        grIncident.update();
    }



})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>CC-Supradhar</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-05-03 04:59:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4ef481421b26a1109cb1639bbc4bcb92</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Bidamount</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="AuctionArc" source="x_1046400_auction">6e876ac81b2ae1109cb1639bbc4bcb2b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AuctionArc">6e876ac81b2ae1109cb1639bbc4bcb2b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_4ef481421b26a1109cb1639bbc4bcb92</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>CC-Supradhar</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-05-03 05:45:59</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4ef481421b26a1109cb1639bbc4bcb92"/></record_update>
